      • Flags

        public Flags(@NonNull
             byte[] data,
             int offset,

        Constructor for Flags
        パラメータ:
        data - byte array from ScanRecord#getBytes()
        offset - data offset
        length - 1st octed of Advertising Data

      • isLeLimitedDiscoverableMode

        public boolean isLeLimitedDiscoverableMode()
        check LE Limited Discoverable Mode
        戻り値:
        true:LE Limited Discoverable Mode bit is 1, false:bit is 0;

      • isLeGeneralDiscoverableMode

        public boolean isLeGeneralDiscoverableMode()
        check LE General Discoverable Mode
        戻り値:
        true:LE General Discoverable Mode bit is 1, false:bit is 0;

        public boolean isBrEdrNotSupported()

        戻り値:

      • isSimultaneousController

        public boolean isSimultaneousController()
        check Simultaneous LE and BR/EDR to Same Device Capable (Controller)
        戻り値:
        true:Simultaneous LE and BR/EDR to Same Device Capable (Controller) bit is 1, false:bit is 0;

      • isSimultaneousHost

        public boolean isSimultaneousHost()
        check Simultaneous LE and BR/EDR to Same Device Capable (Host)
        戻り値:
